products.productdescription: Include the contemporary mayfair in ivory within any dcor scheme for a fresh and elegant effect. products.productdescription: Simply toned, this time with fresh white, the mayfair is a combination of deluxe silky threads and sumptuous cotton, creating a sheer and shimmering blind with elegant finesse, whilst sewn-in batons within each fold encourage a graceful fall and prevent the layers from sagging.Generate a luxurious effect by adorning the white with contrasting textures and intense colours, both to frame the silky blind and to add depth and personality. products.productdescription: Fusing vintage tones of taupe and pink, the aquataine rose has a gorgeously romantic aesthetic, full of charm and prettiness all the way through. The blooming florals sit sweetly on this soft linen, which gathers neatly into the roman's pleats. Opt for an untraditional colour scheme in the dining room, using the pink and brown from the blind as your key colours. Choose creamy white walls, then match dark furniture to the brown and sumptuous fabrics and accessories to the pink. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.productdescription: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over.Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room. Surround with greys and similar shades of yellow for a coordinated look, opting for silver fittings and fixtures, and perhaps the occasional ornament or oddment.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kershaw, Natural - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kershaw, natural - roman blind soft neutrals and contemporary florals meld together in the kershaw natural, a beautifully styled roman blind with a timeless sense of sophisticated and an understated air that will offset most colour schemes.Bring
products.productdescription: Soft neutrals and contemporary florals meld together in the kershaw natural, a beautifully styled roman blind with a timeless sense of sophisticated and an understated air that will offset most colour schemes.Bring a tempered patterning to a bright or bold feature wall in your living room, where the natural will sit pretty against a deep chocolate brown or rich red shade. Add plush fabrics to the rest of the room for a cosy feel that you'll want to sit back and relax in!Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kershaw, Wine - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kershaw, wine - roman blind ever true to its name, the kershaw in wine is a striking array of deep wine red tulip-shaped florals on a neutral background of pale biscuit camel. This stylish roman blind seems contemporary yet traditional, making it well-sui
products.productdescription: Ever true to its name, the kershaw in wine is a striking array of deep wine red tulip-shaped florals on a neutral background of pale biscuit camel. This stylish roman blind seems contemporary yet traditional, making it well-suited to all kinds of homes and settings.Place the wine in the kitchen amidst neutral, cream, or white units, accented by matching wine reds for mood and character. Go for clean lines and straight edges to keep the look simple yet effective.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kershaw, Gold - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kershaw, gold - roman blind the kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect tha
products.productdescription: The kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect that will suit any home.Use the gold as a subtle feature in a hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower a smaller space but would like to add some interest and definition. Surround with similar neutrals, in golds, creams, and greys, for a sophisticated look.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

Adults will love the sweet illustrations too, so consider using it to breathe some life and vivacity into your kitchen or dining room!Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. products.productdescription: If gentle summer hues set your world on fire, then the bougainvillea wisteria will suit your home down to the ground. An ivory-white base is home to a pretty array of pretty lilacs and lavenders and hushed blues and greens, all in the form of gorgeously delicate florals and foliage.Hang the wisteria in the master bedroom, where it will get the full attention it so thoroughly deserves. Surround with similar shades of pink and purple, with the occasional accent in green thrown in for good measure.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.productdescription: The antique feel of the wonderland range is ideal for those in love with the vintage look, and the opal offers a gorgeous palette of pinks, purples, oranges, and greys, all sat on an antique ivory base.Place the opal against soft grey walls in a master or guest bedroom, and carry the pretty purples or magentas through the room in the form of bedding, wall art, and the like. Go for brushed silver fixtures and fittings so as not to overwhelm the look with too much shine.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. It's absolutely perfect for a home with a vintage style, whether traditional or contemporary.The cream will look fantastic in a master bedroom, placed amongst luxe creams and plush fabrics. Pick out the pink tone in the blind to use as an accent colour, keeping the remainder of the room neutral yet luxurious.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.productdescription: Aptly named, the burdock in petrol is a stunning array of off-white burdock imagery, with a gorgeous background of inky petrol blues and jaded burnt oranges. This attractive roman blind has an abstract look to it that offers both contemporary and artistic styling.Hang the petrol in a cosy den or sitting room amidst fellow blues and whites, accented with sunny oranges for depth and character. Contemporary furniture will work wonderfully, as will dark polished woods - but always remember to add in plenty of lighter tones so as not to overdo it.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. products.productdescription: The burdock natural displays an earthy green canvas covered in fluffy white burdock flowers. Accenting colours include light aqua, deep lilac, and charcoal black, and the overall effect is moodily natural.Team the natural with a nature-inspired theme, where it will fit in perfectly. Include creamy whites, pale lilacs, and sweet aquas to lighten to look, and go for natural woods and perhaps some slate or other natural stones. This would make a beautiful look for a dining room or den in a modern country home.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Burdock, Dandelion - Roman Blind

products.productdescription: The burdock in dandelion certainly earns its name, showing deep dandelion yellows and oranges across a rich canvas of burdock imagery. The end result is a sunny and cheerful one, and hanging this blind in your home is sure to brighten up any room.Enhance a sunroom that catches the light by using the dandelion as a secondary source of sunny yellow. products.productdescription: Generate elegance and style by including emperor in mushroom in your dcor, where a silky thread forms a chiffon-like blind with a ribbed effect. The shimmering grey shade will blend with most subdued dcor schemes for a touch comforting texture and dazzling colour. Create a cool and contemporary look in a basic white bedroom by including soothing shades of dove grey and eye-catching silver accessories. Combine the lustrous mushroom with alike toned fabrics and metallic touches for added contrast and character.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Mulberry - Roman Blind

products.productdescription: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings. Keep sofas and chairs in either purple or cream, with cushions in opposing colours, incorporating a pretty pattern if you can. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, kiwi - roman blind luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to fo
products.productdescription: Luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to form a perfect roman blind. Add a calming softness to the spare bedroom by centring your decor around the kiwi. Keep things light and airy by sticking to white walls and white and lime bedlinen and cushions. To add a sense of depth, try accenting with a deeper sage or forest green. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Green - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, green - roman blind a rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. <br
products.productdescription: A rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. Combined with the sumptuous layers of the roman blind style, this is a plush piece indeed. Dress your dining room in old-fashioned splendour by blending the green amongst patterned wallpaper, dark mahogany furniture, and cream accents. Go for silver or pewter fixtures and fittings for a more contemporary twist. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

The classic kent fabric, with its plush, chenille texture, adds a softness and sense of cosiness to the colour, resulting in a stylish and appealing blind. Settle the navy against white or cream walls in the living room or master bedroom, matching it to other, differently textured fabrics throughout the room. Accent with a rich, saffron yellow to make the navy truly pop, and you have yourself an attractive, on-trend colour scheme. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
